text: I used Improv on the original NeXT computer and I thought it was wonderful. I think it was perfect for what spreadsheets are supposed to be, but not for what they actually are. Spreadsheets are generally very sloppy, an according to a study by Microsoft, more often than not, don't actually perform any calculations. They're primarily used just to make semi-structured lists.

text: Show some people the Insert Table and they'll think you're some sort of magician.  Then they'll ask why everything has to be so tightly organized around rows and columns.
